about_the_game:
Step into the captivating world of a sandbox role-playing game that immerses you in a mysterious island torn apart by chaos. As the protagonist, you find yourself amidst a struggle between various factions locked in war with each other, all while facing a common enemy—the relentless Undead hordes threatening to engulf the entire land in eternal darkness.

The once-thriving island now bears the scars of a spreading Blight, a malevolent force devouring everything in its path. Your journey begins on the outskirts of this diverse and sprawling landscape, where survival hinges on building, farming, forging alliances, and mastering the arts of combat.

Shape relationships with the various factions through a dynamic reputation system, influencing their attitudes towards you and unlocking new quests, resources, and opportunities.

The Factions


The Adventurers
Once part of a thriving merchant company, the Adventurers are now stranded on the island, driven by their relentless greed. They remain fixated on uncovering valuable archaeological treasures, hoping one day to return to the mainland with their newfound wealth.

The Templars
As devout religious zealots, the Templars are committed to purging the island of all evil. Their rigid sense of morality often leads them to extreme measures, sometimes threatening the lives of those who do not share their beliefs.

The Hinari
Hailing from the Eastern Kingdoms, the Hinari are a seafaring people who have landed on the island over the years. Though strong and capable, they tend to keep to themselves. Whispers suggest that some Hinari have dabbled in dark arts and made pacts with demons, but these are only rumors.

The Bandits
Pillagers and pirates, the Bandits are ruthless opportunists who exploit the island’s lawlessness for their own gain.

Key Features


Settlement Building


Begin your journey with just a humble campfire and build your own settlement from the ground up. Transform it into a bustling community complete with thriving farmlands, blacksmiths, and trading posts. Recruit NPCs to assist with tasks like guarding your settlement, crafting essential items, and ensuring your survival.

Resource Gathering


Gather all the essential supplies to endure the unforgiving wilderness of Sylvandor. Enhance your gear, fortify your home, and strengthen your character using a variety of potions, items, enchantments, and more.

Combat


Hone your skills in the art of timed parrying to dominate every battle and emerge victorious. Combine unique abilities from your gear pieces to craft versatile builds, empowering you to adapt and conquer any challenge that comes your way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 8GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 13600 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 12GB / AMD Radeon RX 6600 8GB

short_description: Craft your settlement, survive the cursed island, and uncover its dark mysteries. Strengthen your character by mastering new skills, learning recipes, and gaining favor with factions. Battle the Blight, a lingering curse of black magic that threatens to consume everything in its path.

English*, Hungarian, Romanian, Russian, Spanish - Spain
